typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empId as short,
		empName as string,
		empGender as string,
		deptId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employee
source(output(
		deptId as short,
		deptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> department
empGenderModification, department join(employee@deptId == department@deptId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joins
department derive(deptName = upper(deptName)) ~> deptModification
empNameModification derive(empGender = upper(empGender)) ~> empGenderModification
employee derive(empName = upper(empName)) ~> empNameModification
Joins sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EmpDeptMerger'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empId,
		empName,
		empGender,
		deptName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MergeBothEmpDept
